text: Arsène Claude Ménard (14 November 1906 – 2 September 1980) was a French high jumper who won a bronze medal at the 1928 Summer Olympics with a jump of . He achieved his personal best of that same year in Dairen.Claude Menard. Track and Field Brinkster. Retrieved on 25 November 2014.Claude Menard. Sports Reference. title: Claude Ménard (athlete)
